guide.introduction: You can build this easily and all it costed me was $14 for a BT headset, and a $1 for a Radio Shack transistor. Please see the full details at www.didicloseit.com or facebook.com/didicloseit.
guide.introduction_rendered: You can build this easily and all it costed me was $14 for a BT headset, and a $1 for a Radio Shack transistor. Please see the full details at www.didicloseit.com or facebook.com/didicloseit.

lines.text: Please view my website at www.didicloseit.com

guide.summary: Can't remember if you closed the garage door?  I created a way to remotely monitor and control your garage door with an old Android phone, a BT headset, and a few free Android Apps.  Also for letting someone in w/o having to give out keys or door codes.
guide.title: Android Controlled Garage Door
